== Bio ==
Mattias Wadenstein has a background in systems administration from the
High Performance Computing Center North HPC2N, Umeå University, and has
been working for the NDGF Tier-1 as systems integrator for most of the
project’s lifetime. He is now Area Coordinator and is responsible for
delivering the WLCG Tier-1 services to the LHC experiments.
